modification.replace: <xen:include template="hoffi_dm_forumoptions"> <xen:map from="$forum" to="$f" /> </xen:include> $0 <input type="submit" name="saveandsetchilds" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_save_and_child}" accesskey="c" class="button" id="saveForumChild" />

• {xen:phrase h_dm_wiremanagericon}
    • $0

phrases.phrase:
Choose the type of dice you want to roll.
The following Sets are avaiable:
Activate the Dice Roller including the use of all wiresets in this node.
Avaiable Wiresets that can be rolled

The roll data will be passed as the first parameter.
The options will be passed as an array as the second parameter.
You are going to delete the following rule:
Count all winning dice. This can be higher that rolled dice, if they explode.

How many dice can be rolled.
Hint: Set the overall maximun count for all forums in the main options.
enter a good name to identify this rule later in the wiresets.
In this Forum you can roll dice
is this die active, and can be used by Users?
If you turn it off, ne new rolls can use this die, but old rolls still show this die.
You can specify an image for this die. This will be shown up instead of the title.

could not find this die.
Is it rolled under the table?
How many sides this type of dice have?
enter a unique tag to identify the die. The Users can use this by manual add Dice-Tag, eg.: w6, d20 oder fudge
Give this die a nice name, that shows up, everytime it's rolled.

enter the possible values for this die, if you want standard (1 to sidecount), leave it blank.
you need to give as many values as sides samples for a 20sided die: 1-20: sets the Values from 1 to 20. The default behavior of a d20. 1-10,1-10: sets to times 1 to 10. 5*2,5*4,9*10,20: sets: five time the 2, five times the 4, nine times the 10 and the twenty.
The display order of the selected wiresets for the forum.
activate the dice roller in this forum
Please select a maximum of dice
please select the minimum of dice
Rolling dice in threads and posts
Just hit the "Roll Dice" Button under the Message area.

This die wil be removed from all Wiresets that use this die.
Maybe, you want to disable this die?

If you dlete the rule, some wiresets may no longer work correctly.
Wiresets, that uses this rule, will use no rule, if you delete this rule.
Note: If you delete a Wireset that is used before, the output of old rolls will not shown up, what is rolled. The results will still show up.
the wireset you want to import, already exists

It seems, that you have installed the Social Groups by Waindigo.
You can install the [h] Social Dice, to roll Dice in the Social Forums.
the file contains no known wireset xml
You uploadad an invalid Wireset XML file.

You selected Messages with {count} dice rolls inside.
If the target message is inside a forum, for that dice rolls are not enabled, all {count} rolls will be deleted.
You are not allowed to view the dice result.
You have not rolled any die yet.
how many dice can rolled in one post
You luck one, no wireset use this rule. It's safe to delete.
Please enter a tag using a-z and 0-9 characters only.

You can't change or delete this protecterd wireset.
It's needed as default set to roll anything you want.

This wireset is protected.
Some Wiresets are set as protected doe internal and core usage. You can only edit a few fields for your own purpose.
Do you really want to delete this roll?
You can roll simple dice without rules.
All winning rules for rolling dice
Can't find corresponding rule. Please Check!
Give an Identifier. Only Letters, Numbers and _-
Save forum and dice for children
Only the selected wiresets can be rolled in this forum

Sort the dice ascending.
This can cause problems, if you need the followed die if one explodes.
build sum with all winning dice
tags must contain more than just numbers or a "-".
The following wiresets used this rule

You must turn on the wireset System to use them.

You can turn on them in the Settings.
Select Wiresets the use cann roll in this forum.
Please describe for what you can use this wireset. eg.g. Vampire The Masquerade Dark Age, 10's explode. 1' s negate.
did this type of roll explode?
enter a pth to the wireset image (Icon) path on your Server. You can leace this blank
How many dice a user can use in one roll.
How many dice a user must use in one roll.
how many options can this Wireset have? 0 to 8
enter a unique tag to identify the wireset. The Users can use this by manual add Dice-Tag, eg.: w6, d20 oder fudge
give this Wireset a cool name
Your dice roll {roll} in your post inside the thread {title} was deleted.

You can't roll dice here and now.
Maybe you're time to roll is up?
Currently no die is rolled in this Post.

The places where user can roll dice.
You can be more specific in the Usergroup Options. If you disable the settings here, the usergroups can not override this setting.
Collapse dice roll results in posts

You can choose, if and how the rolls are displayed inside the post.
Open and No Collapse will increase the length of the default page.
Activate this Option, to display Mods, who are set in parent Forums.
Enable this, if you had imported dice rolls from my old vBulletin AddOn. If not, let this option deactivated to save performance.

Activate the Checkbox, if you want to get a key.

This Key's will be fetched from Hoffis Server. If it didn't work, please contact Hoffi at XenForo.com or XenDACH.de
The maximum wiresets that can be rolled in one Post.

Here you can set and change th overall maximum amout of rolls can be done in one post.
This Setting can be lowered by the wireset itself, but not increased.

Users that are in the following Usergroups won't be set a Piwik Tracking Code.
So you can cut out your Team and/r Administrators from tracking.
Select some Details, that shown up on the Piwik Main Page inside the ACP.
View any dice roll in post
You can specify the display of the dice results inside the message.
Change the look of the exploded die.
Change the look of the winning die
Format the display with the default background image, if no special is specified.

Be careful, this cann actually add a lot of querys. In a leter Version this will be optimized.
Actually disabled until next version...
If you activate this, and in the forum is roll dice allowed, a small Icon will indicate this.
Specify how the Node Icon appears
Here is specified, how the Code looks.
format the area for a complete roll of a wireset
Formats the result of the complete wireset in the message

property.title: Show Die Icon
property.description: If you activate this, and in the forum is roll dice allowed, a small Icon will indicate this.

property.title: Die Display
property.description: Format the display with the default background image, if no special is specified.

property.title: Roll Display
property.description: format the area for a complete roll of a wireset

property.title: Wireset Heading
property.description: Formats the result of the complete wireset in the message

property.title: Winning Die
property.description: Change the look of the winning die

property.title: Exploding Die
property.description: Change the look of the exploded die.

property.title: Node Icon
property.description: Specify how the Node Icon appears

property.title: Display Icon in Message List
property.description:
Be careful, this cann actually add a lot of querys. In a leter Version this will be optimized.
Actually disabled until next version...

group.title: Dice Manager
group.description: You can specify the display of the dice results inside the message.

modification.replace: <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.thread} AND {$forum.allow_diceroll}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link dice-thread/roll-thread, $forum}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.thread} AND {$forum.allow_diceroll}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link dice-thread/roll-thread, $forum}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.dice_roll_in.quickreply} AND {$thread.canRollDice}"> <input type="button" href="{xen:link 'dice-roll/roll-post', $thread}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-target="dice-info" value="{xen:phrase h_dm_roll_dice}" /> </xen:if> $0
